title.rendered: INTECH’s OT Cybersecurity expertise will help in securing Plant Wide Network of a major Central Processing Facility in the Middle East

content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]INTECH’s OT Cybersecurity expertise continues to impress leading oil & gas players in the Middle East as it wins another project for securing plant-wide network of a major CPF.

INTECH has been helping some of the leading players in the region across diverse industries in achieving their OT Cybersecurity objectives which includes recent projects for enhancing OTCS posture of major oil producing facilities, securing critical OT assets at a key manufacturing facility, securing PCN network at one of the largest petrochemical facilities, and improving CS posture for a major Oil & Gas company’s OT network. The award of this project reflects the growing trust of major industrial enterprises in the region in INTECH’s OT Cybersecurity expertise, its more than three decades of experience with OT assets, and the strength of its solutions.

INTECH will upgrade the plant-wide network & systems to fulfill the client’s objective of full compliance with regional and end-user OT security standards. The scope includes upgrade of network infrastructure, OEM systems, and network monitoring systems. As part of the upgrade, INTECH will replace all legacy software with the latest versions and implement/migrate configurations as needed.

About INTECH OT Cybersecurity

INTECH’s OT Cybersecurity expertise is built on deep-rooted knowledge and over 30 years of experience with complete lifecycle of OT systems design, deployment, management, and upgrades. INTECH’s multi-disciplinary teams of experts, with extensive experience on systems from leading OT system vendors, are helping some of the largest industrial organizations towards a secure digital transformation.

We can help you capture maximum advantage from enhanced connectivity by strengthening the cybersecurity posture of your critical infrastructure & industrial systems through a combination of consolidated visibility & risk management, round-the-clock anomaly & threat detection, OT Network segmentation, and OT systems & network hardening. Our global partnership with leading OT Cybersecurity firms makes sure that our solutions are deployed speedily and integrated seamlessly without any complications.

For more information, please visit: www.intechww.com/digital/ot-cybersecurity/

About INTECH

INTECH Automation & Intelligence is a globally renowned industrial automation & digitalization technology company. For nearly 30 years we have helped major oil & gas companies resolve their most pressing issues of instrumentation, control, and electrical automation. INTECH’s diversiﬁed automation solution portfolio, technical skills, knowledge, and expertise on equipment from all major OEMs, and our asset-application speciﬁc approach to solution design are what differentiates us from a typical system integrator.

As part of our promise of helping businesses evolve in the Industry 4.0 era, we have focused on building up our expertise on Industrial IoT and related digitalization solutions. We are gradually shifting from a project-based solution provider to a partnership-based solution provider. We have started working closely with our technology and platform partners as well as clients to build long-term relationships where we work together to solve problems and provide solutions that are cost-efficient, time-efficient, and bring the best of what everyone can offer.

For more information, please visit: www.intechww.com[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
